1.text: Fold an 8 ½ in x 11 in (21.5 cm x 28 cm) sheet of paper in half.

2.text: Unfold the paper, rotate it 90 degrees, and fold it in half again.

3.text: Flip the paper so that the fold opens toward you.

4.text: Bring the bottom of the paper up to fold it against both sides.

5.text: Take the bottom corners and fold them in.

6.text: Make the triangle into a square.

8.text: Construct the triangle into a square again.

9.text: Pull out the triangles on the side of the square.
